name: Temple Of Hercules
description:
Global Game Jam Entry 

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/temple-hercules-2

Escape an Ancient Greek temple by traveling back and forward in time. Collecting clues to help solve a puzzle.

Use the portal to jump back in time which will help you solve the puzzle. Turn the stones until the correct number corresponds to the image. To give you the full experience of being an archaeologist I highly recommend you use a pen and paper to take notes (I know it takes effort, but it will seriously save you time). Use “q” and ”e” to turn the circular stone.
